The video was published on Facebook on J: 2020, and has been viewed more than 800 times.
The post: s Thai-language caption translates to English as the new Mongolian president visited China two months ago and promised to send 30,000 herds of sheep to China.
Mongolian President Khaltmaagiin Battulg: 000 sheep to support China's fight against COVID-19 during his state visit to Beijing on February 27, 2020. This information was reported by Mongolia's national news agency, Montsame, and China's state-run broadcaster China Global Television Network.
A reverse image search using InVID: WeVerify found an identical video published on the Facebook page of Polish news website Korso Sanockie on May 6, 2020, with a Polish-language caption mentioning the video was taken somewhere in Spain.
